author: MathildeMusic

text: Have you played The Last Guardian? The soundtrack is immense. Once you play through the game, each song has such deep emotional pulls that bring you right back to that spot in the game. I haven't experienced anything like that from a game in a long time. It's a fantastic game and if you have the chance to go through it you definitely should!
author: FairlyUnknown

text: I haven't yet, but it's certainly high in my backlog. I'm sure the music will be a highlight!
author: SupraDarky

text: For one reason or another I completely missed this game at its launch, and I have yet to play it. Though its music is really good!
author: Eirian Odalis

text: You know, I don't know if I ever thanked you man. Years ago I had looked for Super Mario Galaxy music (the only game I owned) because I loved the sound so much, and I found your channel. You introduced me to so many cool pieces from games I'd never heard of. Dustforce has an INCREDIBLE soundtrack!!! So thanks again! Now I cover video game music on my harp, and I don't know how I would've fallen in love with it in the first place without channels like yours. Thank you SupraDarky! ‚ù§Ô∏è
author: Harp Soup

text: Thank you for the good words Harp Soup, these are the kind of comments that remind me why I do this in the first place. Looking at your channel, you are obviously very talented! Cheers.

text: Dang, I remember when I first heard of this game through a couple of your uploads here. Wound up spending more time dusting than I ever imagined. Soundtrack's still great, even after hearing most tracks on loop for countless hours while going for faster and faster times.

author: TruciT

text: I really wish Lifeformed had worked on more OSTs since this game's release 5 years ago. It has to be one of my favorite indie game soundtracks. I really like this track's more disjointed structure and sound effects, it makes your ears work in a pleasant way.
author: SupraDarky
